---
name: RAD27_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae RAD27 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the RAD27 gene encoding a 5' to 3' exonuclease involved in DNA replication and repair in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is cell cycle regulated with peak expression during the G1/S transition.
